item.text: When Joshua was very old, the Lord told him, “You are very old, and a great deal of land remains to be conquered.

<st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> is the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> that <st data-num="07604" class="">remains</st>: <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01552" class="">territory</st> of the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01651" class="">Geshurites</st>,

<st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="07883" class="">Shihor</st> River<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834 05921 06440">east</st> of<n id="2" /> <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> <st data-num="06828" class="">northward</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st> of <st data-num="06138" class="">Ekron</st> (it is <st data-num="02803" class="">regarded</st> as <st data-num="03669" class="">Canaanite</st> territory),<n id="3" /> including the area belonging to the <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistine</st> <st data-num="05633" class="">lords</st> who ruled in <st data-num="05841" class="">Gaza</st>, <st data-num="0796" class="">Ashdod</st>, <st data-num="0832" class="">Ashkelon</st>, <st data-num="01663" class="">Gath</st>, and <st data-num="06139" class="">Ekron</st>, as well as <st data-num="05757" class="">Avvite</st> land<n id="4" />

to the <st data-num="08486" class="">south</st>;<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03669" class="">Canaanite</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">territory</st>,<n id="2" /> from <st data-num="04632" class="">Arah</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">in the region</st> of <st data-num="06722" class="">Sidon</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0663" class="">Aphek</st>, <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> <st data-num="0567" class="">Amorite</st> <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st>;

the <st data-num="0776" class="">territory</st> of <st data-num="01382" class="">Byblos</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03844" class="">Lebanon</st> to the <st data-num="04217 08121">east</st>, from <st data-num="01171" class="">Baal Gad</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">below</st> <st data-num="02022" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="02768" class="">Hermon</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">Lebo</st> <st data-num="02574" class="">Hamath</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="03423" class="">drive out</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> in the <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> <st data-num="03844" class="">Lebanon</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="04956" class="">Misrephoth Maim</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="06722" class="">Sidonians</st>; you <st data-num="07535" class="">be sure to</st> <st data-num="05307" class="">parcel</st> it <st data-num="05159" class="">out</st> to <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> I <st data-num="06680" class="">instructed</st> you.<n id="2" />
Now, divide up this land among the nine tribes and the half-tribe of Manasseh.”
The other half of Manasseh, Reuben, and Gad received their allotted tribal lands on the east side of the Jordan, just as Moses, the Lord’s servant, had assigned them.

Their territory started<n id="1" /> from <st data-num="06177" class="">Aroer</st> (<st data-num="0834 05921">on</st> the <st data-num="08193" class="">edge</st> of the <st data-num="0769" class="">Arnon</st> <st data-num="05158" class="">Valley)</st>, included the <st data-num="05892 0834">city</st> in the <st data-num="08432" class="">middle</st> of the <st data-num="05158" class="">valley</st>, the <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="04334" class="">plain</st> of <st data-num="04311" class="">Medeba</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> <st data-num="01769" class="">Dibon</st>,

and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> of <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="05511" class="">Sihon</st> of the <st data-num="0567" class="">Amorites</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="04427" class="">ruled</st> in <st data-num="02809" class="">Heshbon</st>, <st data-num="05704" class="">and ended at</st> the <st data-num="01121 05983">Ammonite</st> <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st>.

Their territory also included<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st>, <st data-num="01651" class="">Geshurite</st> and <st data-num="04602" class="">Maacathite</st> <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="02022" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="02768" class="">Hermon</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="01316" class="">Bashan</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="05548" class="">Salecah</st>—

the <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="04468" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="05747" class="">Og</st> in <st data-num="01316" class="">Bashan</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="04427" class="">ruled</st> in <st data-num="06252" class="">Ashtaroth</st> and <st data-num="0154" class="">Edrei</st>. (<st data-num="01931" class="">He</st> was <st data-num="07604" class="">one of the few</st> <st data-num="03499" class="">remaining</st> <st data-num="07497" class="">Rephaites</st>.)<n id="1" /> <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="05221" class="">defeated</st> them and <st data-num="03423" class="">took</st> their <st data-num="03423" class="">lands</st>.<n id="2" />

But the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03423" class="">conquer</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="01651" class="">Geshurites</st> and <st data-num="04602" class="">Maacathites</st>; <st data-num="01650" class="">Geshur</st> and <st data-num="04601" class="">Maacah</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> <st data-num="07130" class="">among</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> very <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>.
However, Moses did not assign land as an inheritance to the Levites; their inheritance is the sacrificial offerings made to the Lord God of Israel, as he instructed them.
Moses assigned land to the tribe of Reuben by its clans.

<st data-num="01992" class="">Their</st> <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">started</st> at <st data-num="06177" class="">Aroer</st><n id="1" /> (<st data-num="0834 05921">on</st> the <st data-num="08193" class="">edge</st> of the <st data-num="0769" class="">Arnon</st> <st data-num="05158" class="">Valley</st>) and included the <st data-num="05892 0834">city</st> in the <st data-num="08432" class="">middle</st> of the <st data-num="05158" class="">valley</st>, the <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="04334" class="">plain</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">of</st> <st data-num="04311" class="">Medeba</st>,

<st data-num="02809" class="">Heshbon</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> its surrounding <st data-num="05892 0834">cities</st> on the <st data-num="04334" class="">plain</st>, including <st data-num="01769" class="">Dibon</st>, <st data-num="01120" class="">Bamoth Baal</st>, <st data-num="01010" class="">Beth Baal Meon</st>,
<st data-num="03096" class="">Jahaz</st>, <st data-num="06932" class="">Kedemoth</st>, <st data-num="04158" class="">Mephaath</st>,

<st data-num="07156" class="">Kiriathaim</st>, <st data-num="07643" class="">Sibmah</st>, <st data-num="06890" class="">Zereth Shahar</st> on the <st data-num="02022" class="">hill</st> in the <st data-num="06010" class="">valley</st>,
<st data-num="01047" class="">Beth Peor</st>, the <st data-num="0794" class="">slopes</st> of <st data-num="06449" class="">Pisgah</st>, and <st data-num="01020" class="">Beth Jeshimoth</st>.

It encompassed<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> of the <st data-num="04334" class="">plain</st> and the <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="04468" class="">realm</st> of <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="05511" class="">Sihon</st> of the <st data-num="0567" class="">Amorites</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="04427" class="">ruled</st> in <st data-num="02809" class="">Heshbon</st>. <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="05221" class="">defeated</st> him and the <st data-num="04080" class="">Midianite</st> <st data-num="05387" class="">leaders</st> <st data-num="0189" class="">Evi</st>, <st data-num="07552" class="">Rekem</st>, <st data-num="06698" class="">Zur</st>, <st data-num="02354" class="">Hur</st>, and <st data-num="07254" class="">Reba</st> (they were <st data-num="05257" class="">subjects</st> of <st data-num="05511" class="">Sihon</st> and <st data-num="03427" class="">lived in</st> his <st data-num="0776" class="">territory</st>).<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="02026 02719">killed</st> <st data-num="01109" class="">Balaam</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="01160" class="">Beor</st>, the <st data-num="07080" class="">omen reader</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">along with</st> the <st data-num="02491" class="">others</st>.<n id="2" />
The border of the tribe of Reuben was the Jordan. The land allotted to the tribe of Reuben by its clans included these cities and their towns.
Moses assigned land to the tribe of Gad by its clans.

Their <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">included</st> <st data-num="03270" class="">Jazer</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> of <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st>, and <st data-num="02677" class="">half</st> the <st data-num="01121 05983">Ammonite</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">territory</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> <st data-num="06177" class="">Aroer</st> <st data-num="0834 05921 06440">near</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="07237" class="">Rabbah</st>.

Their territory ran<n id="1" /> from <st data-num="02809" class="">Heshbon</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="07434" class="">Ramath Mizpah</st> and <st data-num="0993" class="">Betonim</st>, and from <st data-num="04266" class="">Mahanaim</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st> of <st data-num="01688" class="">Debir</st>.

It included the <st data-num="06010" class="">valley</st> of <st data-num="01027" class="">Beth Haram</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01039" class="">Beth Nimrah</st>, <st data-num="05523" class="">Sukkoth</st>, and <st data-num="06829" class="">Zaphon</st>, and the <st data-num="03499" class="">rest</st> of the <st data-num="04468" class="">realm</st> of <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="05511" class="">Sihon</st> of <st data-num="02809" class="">Heshbon</st>, the <st data-num="03383 01366">area</st> <st data-num="04217" class="">east</st> <st data-num="05676" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="04217" class="">Jordan</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="07097" class="">end</st> of the <st data-num="03220" class="">Sea</st> of <st data-num="03672" class="">Kinnereth</st>.<n id="2" />
The land allotted to the tribe of Gad by its clans included these cities and their towns.
Moses assigned land to the half-tribe of Manasseh by its clans.

Their <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">started at</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04266" class="">Mahanaim</st> and encompassed <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="01316" class="">Bashan</st>, the <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="04468" class="">realm</st> of <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="05747" class="">Og</st> of <st data-num="01316" class="">Bashan</st>, including <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="08346" class="">60</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> in <st data-num="02333" class="">Havvoth</st> <st data-num="02971 0834">Jair</st><n id="2" /> in <st data-num="01316" class="">Bashan</st>.
Half of Gilead, Ashtaroth, and Edrei, cities in the kingdom of Og in Bashan, were assigned to the descendants of Makir son of Manasseh, to half the descendants of Makir by their clans.
These are the land assignments made by Moses in the rift valley plains of Moab east of the Jordan River opposite Jericho.
However, Moses did not assign land as an inheritance to the Levites; their inheritance is the Lord God of Israel, as he instructed them.
